hero.title: The Minimalist Inspiration
hero.subtitle: With the desire to create products suitable for the modern world from natural materials, we want to share unique ideas at an affordable cost.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.description: We strive to provide sustainable, high-quality products that enhance modern living spaces.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story and mission of Simple Decor

story.description1: Simple Decor was founded with the vision of creating products from natural materials, bringing aesthetic and practical value to modern life.
story.description2: We believe that minimalist design is not just a trend but a sustainable way of living, respecting nature and creating meaningful products.
story.description3: From the early days with a small workshop, we have now developed into an export business serving customers worldwide.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to using natural and environmentally friendly materials

quality.description: Ensuring the highest quality in all products

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: Discover the journey that led us to become a leading natural home decor company
ourStory.storyParagraph1: Simple Decor began as a small family business with a passionate commitment to sustainable living and natural beauty. We believed that every home deserves beautiful, eco-friendly decor that tells a story.
ourStory.storyParagraph2: Over the years, we've grown from a local workshop to an international brand, but our core values remain unchanged. We continue to handcraft each piece with care, using traditional techniques passed down through generations.
ourStory.storyParagraph3: Today, we're proud to serve customers worldwide, bringing the warmth and authenticity of Vietnamese craftsmanship to homes across the globe.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to eco-friendly practices and sustainable materials

2014.title: Company Founded
2014.description: Simple Decor was established with a vision to create beautiful home products from natural materials.

2016.title: First Export
2016.description: Expanded internationally, bringing Vietnamese craftsmanship to global markets.

2018.title: Quality Certification
2018.description: Achieved international quality certifications and established sustainable manufacturing processes.

2020.title: Team Expansion
2020.description: Grew our team of skilled artisans and designers to meet increasing global demand.

2024.title: Innovation & Growth
2024.description: Launched new product lines and embraced digital transformation for better customer experience.
